backend/main.mo: Actor managing user approvals, access control, user profiles, and custom modules with admin-only controls and request handling.
backend/user-name.mo: Defines a simple UserName type containing a name field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files across the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining color tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root element and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component handling identity initialization and routing between login, pending, and main app states.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Route guard that restricts access to admin-only pages and redirects non-admin users.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccessStatus.ts: Hook that queries backend approval and admin status with refetching behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance tied to the current identity with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, approvals, roles, announcements, and custom modules using an actor backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccessPendingScreen.t: Displays and manages pending access requests, including local persistence and approval resubmission.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Provides admin UI for handling approvals, roles, announcements, and custom modules.
frontend/src/pages/HomeScreen.tsx: Shows the main user dashboard with profile setup, modules, announcements, and admin entry.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Renders the login screen using Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/modules/CustomModuleP: Loads and displays a custom module by ID with fallback UI for missing modules and handles module image URL creation and cleanup.
frontend/src/pages/modules/FrieslandFung: Static placeholder module page with header and basic informational content for Friesland Fungies.
frontend/src/pages/modules/LandVanOns.ts: Static placeholder module page providing header and introductory text for Land van Ons.
frontend/src/pages/modules/Pottle.tsx: Static placeholder module page with header and simple descriptive content for Pottle.
frontend/src/router/AppRouter.tsx: Defines the application's route tree including static modules, dynamic custom modules, home, and admin routes with a guard.
frontend/src/utils/customModuleImage.ts: Provides helpers to convert ImageData to object URLs and revoke them to prevent memory leaks.
frontend/src/utils/errorToString.ts: Converts unknown error values into readable strings by extracting message, status, body, and other fields.
frontend/src/utils/imageCompression.ts: Implements client-side image compression with scaling and quality adjustment to keep uploads under size limits.
frontend/src/utils/masterAdmin.ts: Empty file with no implemented functionality.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with extended color tokens, animations, container settings, and typography/container-query/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project state focused on fixing camera image upload 413 errors via client-side compression and displaying raw backend errors.
